mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rn, a.* from (select * from board where teamid = ${teamid} order by time desc) a where rownum <= ${EndNum}) where ${StartNum} <= rn
select * from (select rownum as rn, a.* from (select * from board_comment where teamid = ${teamid} and num = ${pageNum} order by time desc) a where rownum <= ${EndNum}) where ${StartNum} <= rn
select count(*) from board_comment where teamid = ${teamid} and num = ${pageNum}
select pictureurl from members where memberid = #{memberId}
select delegate from team where teamid = #{teamid}
select memberid from memberteam where teamid = #{teamid}
select NVL(memberid,0) from board where num = #{page} and teamid = ${teamid}
select NVL(memberid,0) from board_comment where num = #{page} and cmtnum = ${cmtPage} and teamid = ${teamid}
select NVL(inherence,0) from board where num = #{pageNum} and teamid = ${teamid}
mapper.insert: insert into board (teamid, memberid, num, writer, context, inherence) values(${teamid}, ${memberid}, (select NVL(max(num),0)+1 from board where teamid = ${teamid}), #{writer}, #{context}, #{inherence})

insert into board_comment (teamid, memberid, num, cmtnum, writer, context, inherence) values(${teamid}, ${memberid}, ${num}, (select NVL(max(cmtnum),0)+1 from board_comment where teamid = ${teamid} and num = ${num}), #{writer}, #{context}, #{inherence})
mapper.delete: delete board where num = ${page} and teamid = ${teamid}
delete board_comment where num = ${page} and cmtnum = ${cmtPage} and teamid = ${teamid}
mapper.update: update board set context = #{context}, time = sysdate where num = ${num} and teamid = ${teamid}
update board_comment set context = #{context}, time = sysdate where num = ${num} and cmtnum = ${cmtnum} and teamid = ${teamid}
